revision.text:
Welcome to our To-Do list where we try and keep a track of everything which needs fixing/updating/adding/removing and anything else in any of the pages of the wiki. If you see something that needs to be done on any of the pages, feel free to edit this page and it in the below list or simply drop a message in our [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] and someone else will do it.
We aim to one day have this page empty but it is not so easy unless everyone contributes a little.
Please do not delete the task if done, just write (DONE) before it so that one of the moderators can verify it. == Uncategorized Tasks == # in [[Type and shard effectiveness]] page, the "practicality" section of the page need a clearer text explanation. # in [[Underground]] page, add a infobox on right showing the underground, update the efficiency section image with new underground image. # Figure out a way to detail changes to the wandering pokémon pool based on the berry type currently ripe on the farm (Add to each berry page in the infobox?) # Add the Cover and Plume Fossil underground tile images (in block format like the other fossils) to [[Fossils]] == Categorized Tasks == These task are also put together with like tasks so multiple tasks on one page can be done by 1 person all at once rather than multiple people over a long period of time because of misplaced information. ''Page Creation'' is the creation of an entire page, and then adding all the information, adding lots of images to pages, or just large undertakings of fairly blank pages. ''Finishing Touches'' is for pages that are missing a small bit of info, or need to have a few images uploaded to them. ''Updating'' is for pages that were afflicted by the most recent update of the game, and thus have to be checked for informational inaccuracies. ''Formatting'' is for pages that would need to have their infoboxes changes, the way the information is display, or the general aesthetic changed. === Page Creation === # '''PART''' Created [[Pokemon Day Care]] page, needs image of the Hatchery modal and revisions/additions to the text. # make [[Berry Master]] page better, its too blank and raw right now. # Create [[Shard Case]] page. # Add acquisition table to all [[Evolution Items]] (see [[Dragon Egg]] for reference) === Finishing Touches === === Updating === === Formatting === == Dream tasks == These tasks are so long and such low priority that it is more of a dream to complete them. # add a growth table for each berry timings with maxed sprayduck or boost mulch equipped, they both give same boost so only one table will show time for both conditions (see example page [[Roseli]]) # add a growth table for each berry timing with both maxed sprayduck and boost mulch active (see example page [[Roseli]]) # Write how many total boost mulch each berry need to have the boost active with boost mulch alone (see example page [[Roseli]]) # Write how many total boost mulch each berry need to have the boost active with both boost mulch & maxed sprayduck (see example page [[Roseli]]) # add timing table for berries that need multiple berries to be ripe at the same time (see example page [[Roseli]]) # Add flow chart of each berry (see example page [[Kelpsy]]) # check every page that use PokeCoin.png and make the image appear after the amount. # add battle item type template for other pages in these headings, "Key items", "shop of each region" and any more that can be put under same big heading. # Upload all pokemon images non-shiny and shiny version. # Add images of pokemon before their names in these pages {| role="presentation" class="wikitable mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" |List of pages that need pokemon images ('''Bolded''' are complete up to at least version 0.7.1) |- |'''[[Baby Pokémon]]''', '''[[Burned Tower]]''', '''[[Cave of Origin]]''', '''[[Cerulean Cave]]''', '''[[Dark Cave]]''', '''[[Dawn Stone]]''', '''[[Deepsea Scale]]''', '''[[Deepsea Tooth]]''', '''[[Digletts Cave]]''', '''[[Distortion World]]''', '''[[Dragon Egg]]''', '''[[Dragon Scale]]''', '''[[Dubious Disc]]''', '''[[Egg]]''', '''[[Electric Egg]]''', '''[[Eterna Forest]]''', '''[[Fiery Path]]''', '''[[Fighting Egg]]''', '''[[Fire Egg]]''', '''[[Fire Stone]]''', '''[[Flower Paradise]]''', '''[[Fossils]]''', '''[[Fullmoon Island]]''', '''[[Granite Cave]]''', '''[[Grass Egg]]''', '''[[Hall of Origin]]''', '''[[Hoenn]]''', '''[[Ice Path]]''', '''[[Ilex Forest]]''', '''[[Iron Island]]''', '''[[Jagged Pass]]''', '''[[Johto]]''', '''[[Kanto]]''', '''[[Kings Rock]]''', '''[[Lake Acuity]]''', '''[[Lake Valor]]''', '''[[Lake Verity]]''', '''[[Leaf Stone]]''', '''[[List of Pokemons with attack]]''', '''[[Magmarizer]]''', '''[[Metal Coat]]''', '''[[Moon Stone]]''', '''[[Mt. Chimney]]''', '''[[Mt. Coronet North]]''', '''[[Mt. Coronet South]]''', '''[[Mt. Moon]]''', '''[[Mt. Pyre]]''', '''[[Mt Mortar]]''', '''[[Mt Silver]]''', '''[[New Mauville]]''', '''[[Newmoon Island]]''', '''[[Old Chateau]]''', '''[[Oreburgh Gate]]''', '''[[Petalburg Woods]]''', '''[[Pokemon Mansion]]''', '''[[Pokemon Tower]]''', '''[[Power Plant]]''', '''[[Prism Scale]]''', '''[[Protector]]''', '''[[Protein]]''', '''[[Ravaged Path]]''', '''[[Razor Claw]]''', '''[[Razor Fang]]''', '''[[Reaper Cloth]]''', '''[[Roaming Pokémon]]''', '''[[Rock Tunnel]]''', '''[[Ruins of Alph]]''', '''[[Rusturf Tunnel]]''', '''[[Safari Zone]]''', '''[[Seafloor Cavern]]''', '''[[Seafoam Islands]]''', '''[[Sealed Chamber]]''', '''[[Shiny Stone]]''', '''[[Shoal Cave]]''', '''[[Shops]]''', '''[[Sinnoh]]''', '''[[Sky Pillar]]''', '''[[Slowpoke Well]]''', '''[[Snowpoint Temple]]''', '''[[Soothe Bell]]''', '''[[Spear Pillar]]''', '''[[Sprout Tower]]''', '''[[Stark Mountain]]''', '''[[Sun Stone]]''', '''[[Thunder Stone]]''', '''[[Tin Tower]]''', '''[[Trade Stone]]''', '''[[Union Cave]]''', '''[[Upgrade]]''', '''[[Unova]]''', '''[[Victory Road]]''', '''[[Victory Road Hoenn]]''', '''[[Victory Road Sinnoh]]''', '''[[Viridian Forest]]''', '''[[Water Egg]]''', '''[[Water Stone]]''', '''[[Wayward Cave]]''', '''[[Whirl Islands]]''', '''[[Weather]]''' |} Ditto face roaming Pokémon == Completed tasks awaiting moderators == # '''DONE''' in [[Farm Items]] page, add infobox like image on the right either from ingame farm or from ingame berry master shop. # '''DONE''' in [[Shards]] page, add image of shard type as ingame shard case before each shard type name, make the name of each gym a link to [[Gyms]] page. # '''DONE''' in [[Towns & Cities]] page, write which city is on what route preferably in a table format. # '''DONE''' in [[Dock]] page, add more information and image of dock. # '''DONE''' in [[Dungeon ticket]] page, make the image bigger in infobox, add link to shop. Add image of items before their names. # '''DONE''' in [[Berry Master]] page, add links to various key words. # '''DONE''' in [[Masterball]] page, add link to [[Towns & Cities]] in the berry master tip. # '''DONE''' in [[Medium Restore]] page, move the {{pdollar}} left of the amount and make the town names as links to [[Towns & Cities]] in Acquisition table. # '''DONE''' in [[Pokéball]] page, make the town names as links to [[Towns & Cities]] in Acquisition table. # '''DONE''' in [[Pokéballs]] page, make the towns and regions as links to [[Towns & Cities]] in the Locations column. # '''DONE''' in [[Roaming Pokémon]] page, under the Regions heading, make it a table like view for each region listing pokemon and requirements in 1 column each. # '''DONE''' in [[Safari Ticket]] page, reduce the headers to get rid of content table, add link to city page and gym page. # '''DONE''' in [[Shops]] page, add image of protein in each shop table. # '''DONE''' in [[Small Restore]] page, make the town names as links to [[Towns & Cities]] in Acquisition table. # '''DONE''' in [[Token Collector]] page, move the {{pdollar}} left of the amount and make the town names as links to [[Towns & Cities]] in Acquisition table. # '''DONE''' in [[Ultraball]] page, make the town names as links to [[Towns & Cities]] in Acquisition table. # '''DONE''' in [[Underground]] page, make the underground-only items as plain text and not links. # '''DONE''' in [[XClick]] page, make the town names as links to [[Towns & Cities]] in Acquisition table. # '''DONE''' in [[X Attack]] page, make the town names as links to [[Towns & Cities]] in Acquisition table. # '''DONE''' in [[Large Restore]] page, move the {{pdollar}} left of the amount and make the town names as links to [[Towns & Cities]] in Acquisition table. # '''DONE''' in [[Lucky Egg]] page, move the {{pdollar}} left of the amount and make the town names as links to [[Towns & Cities]] in Acquisition table. # '''DONE''' in [[Lucky Incense]] page, move the {{pdollar}} left of the amount and make the town names as links to [[Towns & Cities]] in Acquisition table. # '''DONE''' in [[Underground]] page, add a "Mine Layout" column under Items heading, see [[Fossils]] page for reference. # '''DONE''' in [[Item Magnet]] page, move the {{pdollar}} left of the amount and make the town names as links to [[Towns & Cities]] in Acquisition table # '''DONE''' Fix Wobbufett's uploaded image # '''DONE''' create a [[Key Items]] page listing all key items of the game. # '''DONE''' in [[Lum]], elaborate the "Strategy and important notes" section of the page. # '''DONE''' Update [[baby pokémon]] for Unova pokémon # '''DONE''' Update [[Shards]] for Unova gyms # '''DONE''' Update [[Events]] for Santa Snorlax Event # '''DONE''' Add Unova roamers to [[Roaming Pokémon]] # '''DONE''' Add Unova egg pokemon to [[Egg]] # '''DONE''' Add Unova gyms to [[Gyms]] # '''DONE''' Add Unova NPCs to [[NPCs]] # '''DONE''' Add Unova shops to [[Shops]] # '''DONE''' Ensure all berry page infoboxes have a berrydex index in them # '''DONE''' Check and fix Egg Cycles, Attack Cycle, and Egg Steps for Gen 6, 7, and 8 pokémon in [[List of Pokemons with attack]] (Note: This is due to the latest breeding patch) # '''DONE''' Add alternate forms and event exclusive pokémon to [[List of Pokemons with attack]] # '''DONE''' Add Catch Rate column to all tables in [[List of Pokemons with attack]] # '''DONE''' [[Unova]] Page created # '''DONE''' Add Unova Towns and cities to [[Towns & Cities]] # '''DONE''' Update all region route lists for optimal shard farming as of version 7.0.0 # '''DONE''' Deleted the second[[Item Magnet]] to make it just say [[Item Magnet]] instead of Item MagnetItem Magnet in [[Battle Frontier]] page in the upgrades section # '''DONE''' Create all Unova dungeon pages # '''DONE''' in [[Babiri]] page, add the aura effect # '''DONE''' in [[Petaya]] page, add the aura effect that while this berry is ripe, it prevents all nearby berry from dying. # '''DONE''' in [[Events]] page, ad more details about what events are and what we look for in planning new events if someone wanna propose any idea # '''DONE''' Create [[Template:Infobox egg]] and add to all egg pages # '''DONE''' Create [[Template:Infobox evolution item]] and add to all evolution item pages # '''DONE''' Add Unova purchase locations to all item pages # '''DONE''' Add Unova routes to [[Route Statistics]] # '''DONE''' Add to [[Poke_Dollar|Pokedollar]] page, preferably detailed information like [[Dungeon Tokens]]. # '''DONE''' Add somewhere that egg steps in the Battle Frontier are the square root of the stage number # '''DONE''' Add Unova [[Protein]] efficiency table # '''DONE''' Add Unova to [[Dungeon Tokens]]

Welcome to our To-Do list where we try and keep a track of everything which needs fixing/updating/adding/removing and anything else in any of the pages of the wiki. If you see something that needs to be done on any of the pages, feel free to edit this page and it in the below list or simply drop a message in our [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] and someone else will do it.
We aim to one day have this page empty but it is not so easy unless everyone contributes a little.
Please do not delete the task if done, just write (DONE) before it so that one of the moderators can verify it. == Uncategorized Tasks == # in [[Type and shard effectiveness]] page, the "practicality" section of the page need a clearer text explanation. # in [[Underground]] page, add a infobox on right showing the underground, update the efficiency section image with new underground image. # Figure out a way to detail changes to the wandering pokémon pool based on the berry type currently ripe on the farm (Add to each berry page in the infobox?) # Add the Cover and Plume Fossil underground tile images (in block format like the other fossils) to [[Fossils]] == Categorized Tasks == These task are also put together with like tasks so multiple tasks on one page can be done by 1 person all at once rather than multiple people over a long period of time because of misplaced information. ''Page Creation'' is the creation of an entire page, and then adding all the information, adding lots of images to pages, or just large undertakings of fairly blank pages. ''Finishing Touches'' is for pages that are missing a small bit of info, or need to have a few images uploaded to them. ''Updating'' is for pages that were afflicted by the most recent update of the game, and thus have to be checked for informational inaccuracies. ''Formatting'' is for pages that would need to have their infoboxes changes, the way the information is display, or the general aesthetic changed. === Page Creation === # '''PART''' Created [[Pokemon Day Care]] page, needs image of the Hatchery modal and revisions/additions to the text. # make [[Berry Master]] page better, its too blank and raw right now. # Create [[Shard Case]] page. # Add acquisition table to all [[Evolution Items]] (see [[Dragon Egg]] for reference) === Finishing Touches === === Updating === === Formatting === == Dream tasks == These tasks are so long and such low priority that it is more of a dream to complete them. # add a growth table for each berry timings with maxed sprayduck or boost mulch equipped, they both give same boost so only one table will show time for both conditions (see example page [[Roseli]]) # add a growth table for each berry timing with both maxed sprayduck amd boost mulch active (see example page [[Roseli]]) # add timing table for berries that need multiple berries to be ripe at the same time (see example page [[Roseli]]) # Add flow chart of each berry (see example page [[Kelpsy]]) # check every page that use PokeCoin.png and make the image appear after the amount. # add battle item type template for other pages in these headings, "Key items", "shop of each region" and any more that can be put under same big heading. # Upload all pokemon images non-shiny and shiny version. # Welcome to our To-Do list where we try and keep a track of everything which needs fixing/updating/adding/removing and anything else in any of the pages of the wiki. If you see something that needs to be done on any of the pages, feel free to edit this page and it in the below list or simply drop a message in our [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] and someone else will do it.
We aim to one day have this page empty but it is not so easy unless everyone contributes a little.
Please do not delete the task if done, just write (DONE) before it so that one of the moderators can verify it. == Uncategorized Tasks == # in [[Type and shard effectiveness]] page, the "practicality" section of the page need a clearer text explanation. # in [[Underground]] page, add a infobox on right showing the underground, update the efficiency section image with new underground image. # Figure out a way to detail changes to the wandering pokémon pool based on the berry type currently ripe on the farm (Add to each berry page in the infobox?) # Add the Cover and Plume Fossil underground tile images (in block format like the other fossils) to [[Fossils]] == Categorized Tasks == These task are also put together with like tasks so multiple tasks on one page can be done by 1 person all at once rather than multiple people over a long period of time because of misplaced information. ''Page Creation'' is the creation of an entire page, and then adding all the information, adding lots of images to pages, or just large undertakings of fairly blank pages. ''Finishing Touches'' is for pages that are missing a small bit of info, or need to have a few images uploaded to them. ''Updating'' is for pages that were afflicted by the most recent update of the game, and thus have to be checked for informational inaccuracies. ''Formatting'' is for pages that would need to have their infoboxes changes, the way the information is display, or the general aesthetic changed. === Page Creation === # '''PART"" Created [[Pokémon Day Care]] page, needs image of the Hatchery modal and revisions/additions to the text. # make [[Berry Master]] page better, its too blank and raw right now. # Create [[Shard Case]] page. # Add acquisition table to all [[Evolution Items]] (see [[Dragon Egg]] for reference) === Finishing Touches === === Updating === === Formatting === == Dream tasks == These tasks are so long and such low priority that it is more of a dream to complete them. # add a growth table for each berry timings with maxed sprayduck or boost mulch equipped, they both give same boost so only one table will show time for both conditions (see example page [[Roseli]]) # add a growth table for each berry timing with both maxed sprayduck amd boost mulch active (see example page [[Roseli]]) # Write how many total boost mulch each berry need to have the boost active with boost mulch alone (see example page [[Roseli]]) # Write how many total boost mulch each berry need to have the boost active with both boost mulch & maxed sprayduck (see example page [[Roseli]]) # add timing table for berries that need multiple berries to be ripe at the same time (see example page [[Roseli]]) # Add flow chart of each berry (see example page [[Kelpsy]]) # check every page that use PokeCoin.png and make the image appear after the amount. # add battle item type template for other pages in these headings, "Key items", "shop of each region" and any more that can be put under same big heading. # Upload all pokemon images non-shiny and shiny version. # Add images of pokemon before their names in these pages {| role="presentation" class="wikitable mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" |List of pages that need pokemon images ('''Bolded''' are complete up to at least version 0.7.1) |- |'''[[Baby Pokémon]]''', '''[[Burned Tower]]''', '''[[Cave of Origin]]''', '''[[Cerulean Cave]]''', '''[[Dark Cave]]''', '''[[Dawn Stone]]''', '''[[Deepsea Scale]]''', '''[[Deepsea Tooth]]''', '''[[Digletts Cave]]''', '''[[Distortion World]]''', '''[[Dragon Egg]]''', '''[[Dragon Scale]]''', '''[[Dubious Disc]]''', '''[[Egg]]''', '''[[Electric Egg]]''', '''[[Eterna Forest]]''', '''[[Fiery Path]]''', '''[[Fighting Egg]]''', '''[[Fire Egg]]''', '''[[Fire Stone]]''', '''[[Flower Paradise]]''', '''[[Fossils]]''', '''[[Fullmoon Island]]''', '''[[Granite Cave]]''', '''[[Grass Egg]]''', '''[[Hall of Origin]]''', '''[[Hoenn]]''', '''[[Ice Path]]''', '''[[Ilex Forest]]''', '''[[Iron Island]]''', '''[[Jagged Pass]]''', '''[[Johto]]''', '''[[Kanto]]''', '''[[Kings Rock]]''', '''[[Lake Acuity]]''', '''[[Lake Valor]]''', '''[[Lake Verity]]''', '''[[Leaf Stone]]''', '''[[List of Pokemons with attack]]''', '''[[Magmarizer]]''', '''[[Metal Coat]]''', '''[[Moon Stone]]''', '''[[Mt.
